Question.Subject: Can IP Tracer Id Topix Post?
Question.Content: Can a IP Tracer identify an IP address on a post on Topix? Is there any software available to get an IP address from a Topix post? Or is the only way to get an IP is through Topix itself? If you have an IP, can a person use a software/site (subscribtion or otherwise) to gain person information such as name, street address, City, State etc. This would be an IP address issued from Comcast. I understand Comcast IP dont id name, street etc...just a general location. I following a Topix post involving such questions. Im afraid someone is going to get sued as threats are being made.
Question.ChosenAnswer: no they cant, but still they have some other ways to get posters ips

Answer.Content: no they cant, but still they have some other ways to get posters ips
